bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Tappahannock, Va., Republican politician. Southworth was a Confederate soldier, member of the Virginia House of Delegates, 1885-1887, and Essex County, Va. clerk, 1887- .

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Southworth compiled scrapbooks of newsclippings pertaining to Virginia and U.S. politics with an emphasis on the career of William Mahone. Other topics include the Confederate legacy, prohibition, and racial and religious issues. Elections tickets are pasted in several volumes.
